name: Leaf Hopper
description:
Developer: GK1000

Publisher: GK1000

Theme: Game Boy, Plant(s)

In this game, you play as Hoppy the frog who wants to challenge himself to reach the summit of the tallest tree in the world.

Controls:

Left key: Move left

Right key: Move right

Z: Jump (A button)

X: Exit/Quit (B button)

Enter: Pause menu (Start button)
